verses.text: Now Abraham \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w to|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* region \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w Negev|strong="H5045"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w settled|strong="H3427"\w* \w between|strong="H3427"\w* \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w Shur|strong="H7793"\w*. \w While|strong="H3427"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H3427"\w* \w staying|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Gerar|strong="H1642"\w*,

\w Abraham|strong="H3947"\w* said \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* wife \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w*, “\w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* sister.” \w So|strong="H3947"\w* Abimelech \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Gerar|strong="H1642"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w One|strong="H1931"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, however, God came \w to|strong="H4191"\w* Abimelech \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* \w and|strong="H3915"\w* told \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H2472"\w* \w as|strong="H3947"\w* good \w as|strong="H3947"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* woman \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3947"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w married|strong="H3947"\w* woman.”

\w Now|strong="H1571"\w* Abimelech \w had|strong="H1471"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w gone|strong="H3808"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* replied, “\w Lord|strong="H6662"\w*, would \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w destroy|strong="H2026"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w though|strong="H1571"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w innocent|strong="H6662"\w*?

Didn’t Abraham tell \w me|strong="H6213"\w*, ‘\w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H6213"\w* sister’? \w And|strong="H6213"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w herself|strong="H1931"\w* said, ‘\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H6213"\w* brother.’ \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w integrity|strong="H8537"\w* \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w my|strong="H6213"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w innocence|strong="H5356"\w* \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w my|strong="H6213"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3651"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* Abimelech \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, “\w Yes|strong="H3588"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* clear conscience, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w sinning|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Me|strong="H5414"\w*. \w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w*’s wife, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*, \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w aware|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*—\w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* belong \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w Early|strong="H7925"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* next \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* Abimelech \w got|strong="H7925"\w* \w up|strong="H7925"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*; \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* described \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H5650"\w* \w happened|strong="H1697"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H5650"\w* \w were|strong="H1697"\w* \w terrified|strong="H3966"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* Abimelech \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Abraham \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*? \w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w brought|strong="H6213"\w* \w such|strong="H6213"\w* tremendous \w guilt|strong="H2401"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5978"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*? \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w things|strong="H1419"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H5978"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.”

Abimelech \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* Abraham, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w prompted|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*?”

Abraham replied, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w thought|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* myself, ‘\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* no \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* God \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w account|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* wife.’

\w Besides|strong="H1571"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* really \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* sister, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* father—\w though|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* mother—\w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* wife.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* God \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H5978"\w* journey \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* father’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w I|strong="H2088"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Sarah, ‘\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w how|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w loyalty|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H5978"\w*: \w Wherever|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H1961"\w*, say \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w me|strong="H5978"\w*, “\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* brother.”’”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* Abimelech \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w cattle|strong="H1241"\w*, \w menservants|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w maidservants|strong="H8198"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H3947"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* wife \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* Abimelech said, “\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w my|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Settle|strong="H3427"\w* \w wherever|strong="H2896"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w please|strong="H2896"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* said \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w*, “\w See|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* am \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* brother \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand pieces \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*. \w It|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w vindication|strong="H3682"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w with|strong="H3198"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*; \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w completely|strong="H3605"\w* \w cleared|strong="H3198"\w*.”

Then Abraham \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* God, \w and|strong="H6419"\w* God \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* Abimelech \w and|strong="H6419"\w* \w his|strong="H3205"\w* wife \w and|strong="H6419"\w* \w his|strong="H3205"\w* maidservants, so that \w they|strong="H3205"\w* could \w again|strong="H7495"\w* \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* \w children|strong="H3205"\w*—

\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w account|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Abraham’s wife \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w completely|strong="H3605"\w* \w closed|strong="H6113"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wombs|strong="H7358"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Abimelech’s \w household|strong="H1004"\w*.
